description:
The new wax finish on Rinne`s scythe is attracting coins! Later, Sakura helps her friends Miho and Rika when a walking mannequin attacks them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Good Luck Wax / Maneko and Kotomi / Where`s My Money?!
Kin`un Wax / Maneko to Kotomi / Furikomi wa Mada ka!
La Cire de la fortune — Maneko et Mantomi — Où est mon remboursement ?
金運ワックス / マネ子とコト美 / 振り込みはまだか!
